content: I'd like to look up the function definition for the following query (explicit_item_bounds). The rust docs only link to the definition of the query macro, how can I (preferably in general) look up function definitions for a particular query?
The best way I know is rg 'fn explicit_item_bounds' :/
Actually even that wouldn't help because query declarations are separated from definitions
The declarations are in rustc_middle::ty but the definition could be anywhere
